title: AI seeps into everyday apps as consumer tech resets in 2026
description: In 2026, artificial intelligence will dominate the consumer technology landscape, driven by low-cost smartphones, vernacular language support, and widespread 5G access. This will lead to the rise of AI companions, hyper-personalized shopping, AI tutors, and voice-first interfaces, as well as everyday health and wellness optimization. | financialexpress.com

title: Xi Touts China's AI, Chip Wins In Triumphant New Year's Speech
description: President Xi Jinping highlighted China’s achievements in artificial intelligence and the chip industry in a triumphant New Year’s Eve speech as he called for more confidence in the country’s development path in the year ahead. “China has become one of the world’s fastest-rising economies in terms of innovative capacity,” he declared in a televised address on Wednesday beamed to the nation’s 1.4 billion people.

title: Brookfield to start cloud business amid AI frenzy, The Information reports
description: Brookfield is starting its own cloud business to lease chips inside data centers directly to artificial intelligence developers, The Information reported on Wednesday, in a bid to gain end-to-end control of the AI value chain.
content:
The cloud business will be tied to a new $10 billion AI fund that the firm is starting and a cloud company called Radiant that Brookfield will operate, the report added.

title: AI an accelerator not a threat: Anand Mahindra
description: Mahindra Group Chairman Anand Mahindra in his New Year address to the Group’s employees said that Artificial Intelligence (AI) must be treated as an accelerator and not as a threat as it would raise blue collar work to a new level of long-term relevance.
